metadata.title: CVE-2019-12106 on Ubuntu 14.04 ESM (trusty) - medium
metadata.description: The updateDevice function in minissdpd.c in MiniUPnP MiniSSDPd 1.4 and 1.5allows a remote attacker to crash the process due to a Use After Freevulnerability.

criterions.comment: minissdpd: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
